name: The Goblin Archives
description:
Welcome to The Goblin Archives! Here, all items that have found their way outside of the clutches of your Goblin Friends end up, piling ever higher.

It is your task to make your way past nasty papers and mean books and retrieve the lost items scattered through the archive. You can also climb ladders!

The Goblin Archives plays as a 2D Platformer made in Unity as part of the Global Game Jam 2021 event.
Controls:
A/D = Move Left/Right
W/S = Climb Up/Down
E = Grab
Spacebar = Jump


It was developed by 4 students:
Art:
Sarah van Loenen

Design:
Sule Cankaya
Boyd Catsman

Programming:
Thijs van Boesschoten
